Migration: Remove JSON files and migrate to Supabase database

- Deleted all JSON data files (subscriptions, coupons, tokens, etc.)
- Updated adminAnalyticsService to fetch from Supabase
- Updated adminUserService to use Supabase services
- Created supabaseUserMappingService for user-GBP mappings
- Added clearAllData script for cleanup
- Added deleteAllUsers script for user management

All data now stored in Supabase PostgreSQL database:
- Subscriptions, payments, and user mappings
- No more JSON file dependencies
- Consistent data access across all services
